attributes.action: Bring back the Death Penalty for Cold Bloodied Murder and serious crime re-offenders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is obvious that the current UK justice system is not working, all we hear about is sentences being reduced because of prison overcrowding. One easy solution to this problem is to immediately execute murderers where they are proved to be 100% guilty and any criminal who re-offends on a serious crime faces the same sentence.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
